means: （旧时人们人们认为存在于可燃物中的）燃素，热素

word_mean: 燃素：Stahl于1697年提出此术语，他推测可燃物质是燃素的化合物，燃烧是由于燃素离开该化合物的其它结构所致

sentence.Network_en: A thing was inflammable if it contained phlogiston.
sentence.Network_cn: 一样东西如果含有燃素,它就能燃烧.

sentence.Network_en: This hazy " phlogiston theory, " this erroneous conception of burning, led chemistry along a completely false trail.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个莫名其妙的 “ 燃素论 ”,对燃烧做了错误的理解, 把化学扯上了一条完全错误道路.

sentence.Network_en: There are few Ptolemaic astronomers left , or believers in the phlogiston theory of combustion.
sentence.Network_cn: 如今,没有几个天文学家信奉托勒密的地心说,也不会有人相信燃素说.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 燃素（Phlogiston）是个现代很少人听到的名词。如果照波以耳的说法，元素是化学反应中质量不会再减少的成分，那麽燃素就是一种 …
他推翻了当时盛行的燃素说（phlogiston），而确立氧在燃烧的角色。他首先订出系统化的化学命名法以及订出初步完整的元素表来。

list.abs: A thing was inflammable if it contained phlogiston ., 一样东西如果含有燃素 , 它就能燃烧.
动植物学词典 - 专业词典 - 生物医药大词典 ... phlord - 根皮酚，乙基酚 (热度: 447) phlogiston theory - 燃素学说 (热度: 301).
化学家(当时比较流行的说法是「自然哲学家」,化学家与物理学家的差别在当时并不明显)对燃烧却有个与现在很不同的看法,他们将它叫做燃素理论(phlogiston theory)。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek phlogizein 'set on fire', from phlox, phlog- 'flame', from the base of phlegein 'to burn'

means.word_mean: 1. a hypothetical substance once believed to be present in all combustible materials and to be released during burning

auth_sentence.content: Animal substances dissolved by putrefaction...emit phlogiston.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Animal substances dissolved by putrefaction...emit phlogiston.

auth_sentence.content: It took a hundred years to give up the idea of phlogiston.
auth_sentence.res_content: It took a hundred years to give up the idea of phlogiston.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It took a hundred years to give up the idea of phlogiston.

auth_sentence.content: There were phlogiston chemists who went to their grave without admitting phlogiston was wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content: There were phlogiston chemists who went to their grave without admitting phlogiston was wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There were phlogiston chemists who went to their grave without admitting phlogiston was wrong.
